summary.span: 是一个可变引用类型，可包装 数组或 实例。

span.span: is a mutable reference type that wraps a array or a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以为 `varchar` 、 `nvarchar` 、、、 `char` `nchar` 和值获取，也可以 `text` `ntext` 通过非托管缓冲区来创建。 can be obtained for `varchar`, `nvarchar`, `char`, `nchar`, `text`, and `ntext` values, or can be created over an unmanaged buffer.

MemberSignature.Value: public long Read (long offset, char[] buffer, int offsetInBuffer, int count);
.method public hidebysig instance int64 Read(int64 offset, char[] buffer, int32 offsetInBuffer, int32 count) cil managed
Public Function Read (offset As Long, buffer As Char(), offsetInBuffer As Integer, count As Integer) As Long
public: long Read(long offset, cli::array <char> ^ buffer, int offsetInBuffer, int count);
member this.Read : int64 * char[] * int * int -> int64

param.name: offset
param.span: 实例中所含值的 值偏移量。

span.span: An value offset into the value that is contained in the instance.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 向其复制的字符数组缓冲区。

span.span: The character array buffer to copy into.

param.name: offsetInBuffer
param.span: 缓冲区中的一个 整数偏移量，以启动“复制到”操作。

span.span: An integer offset into the buffer to start copying into.

param.name: count
param.span: 一个 整数值，表示要复制的字符数。

span.span: An integer value representing the number of characters to copy.

summary.span: 将此 实例中的字符复制到传入缓冲区中，并返回复制的字符数。

span.span: Copies characters from this instance to the passed-in buffer and returns the number of copied characters.

returns.span: 表示已复制字节数的 值。

span.span: An value representing the number of copied bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果尝试进行读取 ，则会引发异常。If an attempt is made to read beyond , an exception is thrown. 如果 `count` 指定的要复制的字符数超过了从 `offsetInBuffer` 到值的末尾，则仅复制可用字符。If `count` specifies more characters to be copied than are available from the `offsetInBuffer` to the end of the value, only the available characters are copied. 如果目标缓冲区为空引用，则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer is a null reference. 如果目标缓冲区无法接收所请求的字符数，则会引发异常。An exception is thrown if the destination buffer cannot receive as many characters as requested.

param.name: offset
param.span: 实例中所含值的 值偏移量。

span.span: A value offset into the value that is contained in the instance.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 向其复制的字符数组缓冲区。

span.span: The character array buffer to copy into.

param.name: offsetInBuffer
param.span: 缓冲区中的一个 整数偏移量，以启动“复制到”操作。

summary.span: 将传入缓冲区中的字符复制到此 实例中。

span.span: Copies characters from the passed-in buffer to this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此操作写入超过 但在中的位置 ， 则将更新以反映新的结束位置。If this operation writes to a position beyond but within , is updated to reflect the new ending position. 的值 `offsetInBuffer` 必须小于或等于 。The value of `offsetInBuffer` must be less than or equal to . 否则将引发异常。An exception is thrown otherwise. 在写入 null 值实例时，只能指定值0。Only a value of 0 can be specified when writing to a null value instance. 如果尝试写入超出 ，则会引发异常。If an attempt is made to write beyond , an exception is thrown.
